data.comment: The first-half is just kicking off.
In the minute 46, The second-half is now underway.
Joachim Van Damme (Mechelen) has received a first yellow card.
The home team replace William Togui with Gustav Engvall.
In the minute 61, Issa Kabore is booked for the home team.
Marko Kvasina is replacing Makhtar Gueye for the away team.
Jordi Vanlerberghe (Mechelen) gets a yellow card.
It's 0-1 as the referee blows for full-time.
Kevin Vandendriessche (Oostende) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
Goal! Jack Hendry heads Oostende into a 0-1 lead.
Andrew Hjulsager instrumental with a fine assist.
Fashion Sakala is booked for the away team.
